note: Install the AFCI at the origination of the branch circuit.
title: Install an arc-fault circuit interrupter (AFCI) on each 120-volt branch circuit serving bedrooms. This means that lighting, smoke alarm, receptacle, and any other bedroom outlets must be AFCI protected
Use only combination type AFCI after

You may install the AFCI not more than six feet from the origination of the branch circuit if you run the wires in metal conduit or a metallic sheath. Measure the six feet along the branch circuit wires

container-title: Verify local adoption of the 2008 NEC requirement with your local building official
title: Note that the 2008 National Electrical Code (NEC) requires AFCI protection for all 15 and 20-amp branch circuits. This requirement is controversial and may not be adopted in every jurisdiction
